raw_comment: The graph shows that legacy students are--regardless of income--more likely to be admitted than non-legacy students. Any student is more likely to be admitted when their income falls above the 90th percentile.
ace_sentences: The graph shows that legacy students are more likely to be admitted than non-legacy students.
This is true regardless of income.
Any student is more likely to be admitted if the income of the student is above the 90th percentile.
